name: Christmascountdown
0:
”Alexa, open christmas countdown”
”Alexa, start christmas countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des:
Basic and simple skill to that will tell you how many days until Christmas. Nothing fancy, no frills; Christmas only. Just say "Alexa, Christmas Countdown" or add the skill to a routine to have Alexa remind you daily how many days until Christmas. 

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
